com.btisystems.pronx.ems.core.snmp

Interface ISnmpSessionFactory


  • public interface ISnmpSessionFactory
    Factory for creating and configuring ISnmpSessions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISnmpSession createSession(ISnmpConfiguration configuration, String ipAddress)
      Creates and configures an SNMP session
      ISnmpSession createSession(String ipAddress, String community)
      Creates an SNMP session with a default configuration and an optional community string.
      ISnmpSession createSession(String ipAddress, String community, String factoryName, ISnmpConfigurationFactory.AccessType accessType)
      Creates an SNMP session using a named configuration factory and an optional community string

    • Method Detail

      • createSession

        ISnmpSession createSession(ISnmpConfiguration configuration,
                         String ipAddress)
                           throws IOException
        Creates and configures an SNMP session
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to be applied to the session
        ipAddress - the ip address of the target device of the session
        Returns:
        an ISnmpSession connected to the host at ipAddress and configured using configuration
        Throws:
        IOException - as thrown by the underlying network interface

      • createSession

        ISnmpSession createSession(String ipAddress,
                         String community)
                           throws IOException
        Creates an SNMP session with a default configuration and an optional community string.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - the ip address of the target device of the session
        community - community string to be used for the session, or null if the default is to be used.
        Returns:
        an ISnmpSession connected to the host at ipAddress and configured using the default configuration
        Throws:
        IOException - as thrown by the underlying network interface

      • createSession

        ISnmpSession createSession(String ipAddress,
                         String community,
                         String factoryName,
                         ISnmpConfigurationFactory.AccessType accessType)
                           throws IOException
        Creates an SNMP session using a named configuration factory and an optional community string
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - the ip address of the target device of the session
        community - community string to be used for the session, or null if the default is to be used.
        factoryName - name of the configuration factory used to create the session configuration
        accessType - type of snmp access required
        Returns:
        an ISnmpSession connected to the host at ipAddress and configured using a configuration delivered by the named factory
        Throws:
        IOException - as thrown by the underlying network interface
